text: Donatyre is a former municipality of the district of Avenches in the canton of Vaud, Switzerland. On 1 July 2006, it has been part of the municipality of Avenches.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 18 February 2011 == References == Category:2006 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Vaud Category:Villages in Vaud
title: Donatyre
